title: Senior Cybersecurity ML Architect

description:
A company is seeking a Senior ML Architect - Cyber to join their team to support multiple federal agencies through a cybersecurity modernization and risk management program.

Key Responsibilities:
• Architect, design, develop, and deploy enterprise solutions across the AI spectrum, including Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing
• Analyze data from multiple sources, develop algorithms for ML/AI use cases, and ensure data optimization and quality
• Collaborate with various teams and clients to identify and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets, proposing solutions to enhance cybersecurity measures

Required Qualifications and Education:
• Bachelor's Degree in applied mathematics, statistics, computer science, data science, electrical engineering, physics, or closely related field
• Experience with large datasets, including machine data and cybersecurity tool data, and proficiency in SQL, NoSQL, Java/C++, R, Python, etc
• Knowledge of Hadoop, Spark, Storm, or related paradigms and languages such as Pig, Hive, Mahout
• Familiarity with Cloud Data tools (Azure Data Factory, AWS Glue, AWS Stitch) and Cloud Data Lakes/Warehouses in Azure/AWS
• CISSP or Security+ Certification preferred; must be a US citizen able to obtain DHS Suitability/Entry on Duty (EOD) and active Secret or Top-Secret clearance desired
